goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 782kB)
indicator_name: Hazardous waste generated per capita and proportion of hazardous waste treated, by type of treatment
source_compilation_1: Ministry of Ecology, Geology and Natural Resources of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Local Executive Bodies
source_implementation_1: Ministry of Ecology, Geology and Natural Resources of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Local Executive Bodies
target_name: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment
